entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to periods of drizzle mixed with light snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
